name: Nykaa Get Cheeky! Blush Duo Palette - Brazilian Bombshell 01
des: It's time to play naughty and nice with Nykaa Get Cheeky Blush Duo. This blush duo brings a natural-looking flush of color that pops on every skin tone. This palette provides a dominant color and a subtle color for blending and softening edges. Infused with radiance-boosting minerals, These pigments sweep on weightless, And a soft veil of color. The ultra-light, Micronized pigments of these shades blend effortlessly into the skin and give you a buildable coverage to enhance the apples of your cheeks!

name: Kay Beauty Creme Blush - Cosy Coral
des: The Kay Beauty Creme Blush is a highly pigmented formula that delivers a glowy flush to your cheeks. Its mousse-like texture blends seamlessly without streaking or caking. Easy to blend, easy to build, and easy to use, you can work this lightweight blush with your fingertips to create a natural sun-kissed finish. All you have to do is dab, blend and go from a soft daytime finish to a glam night out look.

name: Maybelline New York Fit Me Mono Blush - 20 Hopeful
des: Explore the entire range of Blush available on Nykaa. Shop more Maybelline New York products here.You can browse through the complete world of Maybelline New York Blush.Alternatively, you can also find many more products from the Maybelline New York Fit Me Mono Blush range.

name: Charmacy Milano Cheek Enhancer - 4
des: Glow naturally with Charmacy Milano Cheek Enhancer - a powder blush that helps you achieve that lit-from-within look. Suitable for all skin types, it has a true-to-tone colour and provides great colour pay-off. Take your pick from 4 highly pigmented shades. Its silky and lightweight texture is highly buildable and blendable, and looks freshly applied all day long.

name: Love Earth Multipot-Be The Change Lip Tint with Jojoba Oil and Vitamin E for Lips Eyelids & Cheeks
des: Love Earth Multipot-Be The Change is a multipurpose product that works as a tint and moisturizes your lips as well. It has nourishing and hydrating properties as well. It can be used on your lips, cheeks and eyelids for a flush of colour. This product is made with natural ingredients that will be giving you that fierce nutritive benefits to the innermost layers of your skin. It feels super light and keeps your skin moisturized all day long.

name: Swiss Beauty Lip & Cheek Cream - Cinnamon
des: Swiss Beauty Lip & Cheek Cream multitasks! You and can give your lips cheek or eyelids a tint along with long lasting moisture .it is super light,with goodness of vitamin E and olive oil, to give you a natural fresh and glowing look all day long.

name: Makeup Revolution Superdewy Liquid Blusher You Had Me At First Blush(15ml)
des: Add a hint of tint to your look with the Makeup Revolution Superdewy Liquid Blush. An easy to use, ultra-pigmented, buildable liquid blush. Go for a natural flushed finish or build it up for a more pigmented look with Makeup Revolution Superdewy Liquid Blush.

name: Charlotte Tilbury Pillow Talk Lip And Cheek Glow - Colour Of Dreams
des: Inspired by the best-selling, award-winning world of Pillow Talk and the youthful, playful colours of love, dreams and passion, these radiant, emollient-rich lip and cheek glow creams deliver a look of just-kissed, meadow-fresh, semi-sheer colour to the lips and cheeks, so you can be your most beautiful you!

name: Bobbi Brown Pot Rouge For Lips & Cheeks - Powder Pink(3.7g)
des: Bobbi Brown's best-selling, multitasking cream color for lips and cheeks comes in a mirrored flip-top compact for on-the-spot application.

name: Flower Beauty Blush Bomb Color Drops - Nectar
des: A new way to give your cheeks a fresh healthy glow in an instant! Introducing Flower Beauty Blush Bomb Color Drops, a collection of heart pumping blush shades guaranteed to turn up the volume on your makeup look. Each drop of this silky, lightweight formula blends seamlessly for a perfect flush every time. It has a buildable and natural looking formula.

name: Benefit Cosmetics GoGo Tint
des: Gogotint is the wildest flush you can get from a bottle! This see-through bright cherry red lip & cheek stain is vibrant, juicy and pops till you drop. Release your inner rebel with colour that lasts!

name: Daughter Earth 100% Vegan, Vitamin - E Lip And Cheek Tint
des: Daughter Earth Lip & Cheek Tint is a 100% vegan and nutri-active, vitamin E enriched lip and cheek colour. It is clean, safe and kind to your skin. This pigmented formula gives your lips and cheeks a naturally flushed look. What's better? The brand did so by choosing vegan, clean and kind ingredient alternatives.

name: Benefit Cosmetics ChaCha Tint
des: This mango-tinted stain beautifully blushes lips & cheeks with a tropical coral hue. Smooch-proof & smudge-proof, our sheer stain has a natural finish that will leave you looking deliciously vibrant for hours.

name: SUGAR Air Kiss Powder Lipstick - 04 Cherry Fluff
des: Experience what magic feels like on your lips with India’s 1st ever SUGAR Air Kiss Powder Lipstick. Yes, you read that right! This unique lipstick with a breakthrough powder formula magically melts into a slick matte finish when applied. It leaves behind a bold burst of colour that stays put for hours without any streaks. Ultra-lightweight and non-drying, it dries off within seconds and settles to a smooth texture that is transfer-proof and water-resistant.

name: Flower Beauty Blush Bomb Color Drops - Nectar
des: A new way to give your cheeks a fresh healthy glow in an instant! Introducing Flower Beauty Blush Bomb Color Drops, a collection of heart pumping blush shades guaranteed to turn up the volume on your makeup look. Each drop of this silky, lightweight formula blends seamlessly for a perfect flush every time. It has a buildable and natural looking formula.

name: Renee Cosmetics Lip & Cheek Tint - Red Romance
des: Looking for the magical spell that sets everything alright? Well, Renee's all new Lip and Cheek Tint is that exact secret magic potion packed inside a box. With an alluring shade that can be used for your lips, cheeks and your eyelids, this product is all set to pave its way to your heart.

name: Nykaa Glow Goals! Shimmer Brick Highlighter Palette - Shimmer Rays
des: Nykaa Glow Goals! Shimmer Brick Highlighter Palette - Shimmer Rays

name: Nudestix Nudies Blush All Over Face Color - Bare Back
des: Nudestix Nudies Blush All-Over Face Color is a multi-tasking balm to offer warm bronze and romantic blush tones on your face, eyes and lips for an easy #gonudebutbetter look. Convenient removable blending brush for applying on-the-go!

name: Kay Beauty Contour & Highlight Pro Palette - Contour Genius
des: Define your features like a pro with the Kay Beauty Contour & Highlight Pro Palette that sculpts your face with its high-definition powder matte formula. The all-in-one kit offers three universal shades in a warm tone, cool tone and neutral tone to help you create your own shade that's a perfect match for your skin tone. Its feathery lightweight feel and premium texture allows for beautiful blending and HD contouring that can be built from subtle definition to chiseled cheekbones. This high hydration formula lets you bronze, contour and highlight in one go without the hassle of using multiple products. It’s incredibly long lasting, sweat and water resistant too so no need for constant touch-ups. Get ready to carve out that killer bone structure with minimal effort.

name: Huda Beauty Glowish Soft Radiance Bronzing Powder Mini - 02 Medium
des: The same velvety bronzing powder, now with three shades available in mini size! If you're dreaming of a summer vacay and sun-kissed skin Huda Beauty's GloWish Soft Radiance Bronzing Powder will instantly get you glowing! Beautifully buildable and so easy to use, it lends all skin tones a natural-looking tan, warming your complexion with luminosity! The duo-tone, marble swirl “ which is totally hypnotic “ will take you from a deliciously golden I-just-left-the-beach glow to a more contoured look in just a few swipes!

name: Nudestix Nudies Bronze All Over Face Color - Salty Siren
des: Nudestix Nudies Bronze All-Over Face Color is a multi-tasking balm to offer warm bronze and romantic blush tones on your face, eyes and lips for an easy #gonudebutbetter look. Convenient removable blending brush for applying on-the-go!

name: Rimmel London Natural Bronzer - Sunlight
des: Explore the entire range of Bronzer available on Nykaa. Shop more Rimmel London products here.You can browse through the complete world of Rimmel London Bronzer .Alternatively, you can also find many more products from the Rimmel London Natural Bronzer range.

name: SUGAR Contour De Force Face Palette - 01 Subtle Summit
des: Achieve jaw-dropping, #nofilter beauty looks that'll set your Insta-circle on fire with the all-new SUGAR Contour De Force Face Palette. Crafted for the makeup maven who's slaying goals on the go, this sleek all-in-one face palette houses a power-packed trio of bronzer, highlighter and blush - exactly what you'd love to stash in your clutch to create any look in a flash. Just mix, layer and blend these uber-creamy, lightweight powders for a great payoff that lasts all day, any day. See the magic unfold in the built-in mirror that's super handy for on-the-spot application and prepare to be stunned with how easily this face palette takes your makeup game to a whole new level!

name: theBalm Bahama Mama Bronzer Travel Size
des: For a fresh-off-the-beach glow! This matte bronzer gives you natural, sun-kissed skin without orange undertones, and doubles as the perfect contour powder, neutral brow-filler and eyeshadow.

name: SUGAR Contour De Force Mini Bronzer - 01 Taupe Topper
des: Swipe on the SUGAR Contour De Force Mini Bronzer to sport a subtle, sun-kissed look that will leave everyone wondering which exotic beach destination you are returning from. This illuminating bronzer evens out skin tone, blurs imperfections and gets your diva glow on in just one glorious sweep. Super lightweight and easily blendable - just go ahead and add this little sunshine to your makeup bag and bag the fastest ticket to gorgeous you've ever seen!

name: SUGAR Contour De Force Eyes And Face Palette - 02 - Pink Pro
des: Are you a subtle, nudes kind of a girl or a bold, feisty one who loves a splash of colour? Well you can be both with SUGAR's beautifully curated makeup palettes that are designed with highly pigmented, incredible finishes and come in luxurious travel-friendly packaging for gorgeous looks on-the-go.

name: Benefit Cosmetics Hoola Matte Bronzer - Brown
des: The bronzer that started it all Benefit’s bestselling powder bronzer instantly warms up your complexion and gives a classic matte finish.

name: Swiss Beauty Ultra Glow Highlight and Bronzer Palette - Shade 03
des: Swiss Beauty brings to you this gorgeous Ultra Glow Highlight And Bronzer Palette that features three corresponding shades. The silky, lightweight formula applies and blends smoothly to add that natural, healthy and sunkissed glow.

name: Faces Canada Ultime Pro Face Palette 3 In 1 - Fresh
des: Enhance your facial features in style! Faces bring to you an enchanting 3-in-one face palette that allows you to contour, highlight, and complement your most beautiful facial features along with giving a flawless radiance to your face. FACES Ultime Pro Face Palette includes a lovely bronzer, highlighter, and blush, all in compact travel-friendly packaging, making it an essential in your vanity bag! The light shimmery Blush and Illuminator has a silky-smooth texture and adds a natural glow to your face while the bronzer sculpts your face, gives a luminous glow to your face resulting in a healthy complexion.

name: Charlotte Tilbury Instant Look In A Palette - Sunset Dreamscape
des: Darlings, unlock the secret to a beautiful, mesmerising look inspired by dreamy sunsets!Instant Look in a Palette in Sunset Dreamscape features 7 magical shades for your eyes and cheeks, so you can create a 5 minute glow on the go! Adorn your eyes with the rosy pink and warm berry eyeshadows before bronzing, sculpting and highlighting your complexion with the universally-flattering bronzer, highlighter and blush shades!

name: Too Faced Natural Face Palette
des: Luminize, then add a bronzing veil and a flirty flush with this first-of-its-kind face palette. Infused with hydrating coconut butter, the velvety-soft formula includes multi-dimensional shades that will take your natural beauty up a notch.

name: Nykaa Contour & Conquer - Contour and Highlight Duo - Sizzle Chisel 01
des: Nykaa Contour n Conquer Duo is sure to make your look chiselled to perfection! This curated kit comes with two essential sculpting shades, a perfect mattecontour shade and a luminous pop of light to give you a stunning contoured and highlighted look to die for!

name: Nudestix Nudies Blush All Over Face Color - Bare Back
des: Nudestix Nudies Blush All-Over Face Color is a multi-tasking balm to offer warm bronze and romantic blush tones on your face, eyes and lips for an easy #gonudebutbetter look. This skin-loving soft cream balm melts onto skin to look naturally flushed or sun kissed but always healthy! Made in Korea, the innovative formula kisses the skin with a soft, lightweight and luxurious natural matte formula. Draw effortless nude color all over face for a fresh, natural, youthful â€˜no-makeup makeup look.

name: Smashbox The Cali Contour Palette
des: This easy-to-use, six-well contour kit is pigment-packed with blendable highlighter, bronzer and blush powders to add warmth and dimension to your look. All-in-one contour kit lets you customize your signature Cali glow with versatile shades to create an effortlessly lifted neutral look or a warm, just cruised-down-the-coast glow!

name: Too Faced Natural Face Palette
des: Luminize, then add a bronzing veil and a flirty flush with this first-of-its-kind face palette. Infused with hydrating coconut butter, the velvety-soft formula includes multi-dimensional shades that will take your natural beauty up a notch.

name: Maybelline New York Color Sensational Ultimattes Lipstick - More Scarlet
des:
With Maybelline New York's Color Sensational Ultimattes, more is more! That's more matte, more color intensity, and lightweight feel. Maybelline Color Sensational delivers a lightweight blurring formula made with high-impact pigments in this extreme matte lipstick. Now available in a slim, luxe bullet and a full range of beautiful, non-drying lipstick shades. From more berry to more mauve and more scarlet - nude lipstick to red lipstick - there's definitely more for you to love. Now, that's sensational.
           
             Features:
             
             Pigment rich bullet lipstick that sets to a velvet matte finish
             Enriched with the goodness of jojoba oil and texture blurring gel
             Glides on the lips easily to give you the perfect pout
             Smooth formula ensures easy wear for long hours
             Available in multiple attractive shades
             
             About Maybelline New York From a small, family-owned business to the number one cosmetics company in America today, Maybelline New York takes trends from the catwalk to the sidewalk, empowering women to make a statement, explore new looks, and flaunt their own creativity and individuality. Inspired by confident, accomplished women, Maybelline gives you scientifically-advanced formulas, revolutionary textures and up-to-the minute, trendsetting shades effortlessly, affordably, beautifully.

name: Kay Beauty Matte Drama Long Stay Lipstick - Red Carpet
des: Every girl needs a trusty matte lipstick. One that doesn't smudge, budge or nudge from her lips. The Kay Beauty Matte Drama Lipstick is here to give you luxurious matte lips and unleash the power of long stay. Its velvety luxe texture is what makes it the most coveted of all matte lipsticks, and spells pure opulence. Just one stroke is all it takes to cover your lips with high impact colour. The iconic weightless formula feels feathery light on the lips and is comfortable for all day wear. Our care ingredients containing grapeseed oil and red raspberry ensure that the formula moisturizes your lips while protecting it from sun damage or any blue light. You can take your pick from 24 shades ranging from pinks and nudes to mauves and plums, that will flatter all Indian skin tones. It’s time to pucker up!

name: Renee Cosmetics FAB5 5 in 1 Lipstick
des:
Renee FAB 5 is your go-anywhere-do-anything fantasy must-have product. From a true taupe, a ravishing red to a captivating coral, this container is a curation of best shades from the beauty business. Whether it's the last-minute meeting or a romantic date night, there's nothing that Renee FAB 5 can't fix. You will refuse to leave home without Renee FAB 5 in your bag because from a reserved to a roaring shade, this comprises every lip color you will need through the day.
           
             Features:
             
             5 shades in one lipstick pen, ranging from bold red to subtle coral
             The soft, creamy texture glides easily and ensures comfortable wear
             Highly pigmented formula packs lips with rich colour payoff
             Multipurpose product, travel friendly and great for day to night looks
             This product is cruelty-free and vegan
             
             About the Brand: Introducing Renee by Aashka Goradia, a brand that believes in empowering women to reinvent themselves; redefine how they desire to showcase their persona. Renee means reborn, emphasizing 'Natural is better'. The brand started with 3D handcrafted, cruelty-free lashes and applicators, extending to the Kohlistic Eye Range and now much more.

des:
Milani Color Fetish Matte Lipstick is an ultra-creamy, pigment-rich lipstick in a range of shades designed to compliment every skin tone. With a luxurious soft velvet-matte finish, this high-comfort lipstick glides seamlessly onto lips for full coverage, a one-stroke payoff. The long-wearing formula helps keep lips smooth and soft with moisturizing hyaluronic acid.

name: Charlotte Tilbury Matte Revolution - Lost Cherry
des:
This matte lipstick of the future! Matte Revolution lipstick is the revolutionary matte formula in a long-lasting, buildable lipstick, perfect for an effortlessly gorgeous makeup look!
           
             What makes it magic?
             
             - Get luminous, cashmere-soft lips in a matte finish with a slick of one lipstick
             - A blend of oils, triglycerides and waxes give you buildable, long-lasting colour for up to 10 hours!
             - Lipstick tree and orchid extract softens, protects and hydrates lips for younger-looking, healthy lips
             - Revolutionary, square, angled tip mimics the shape of a lip brush for precision application
             - 3D glowing pigments create an illusion of fuller, wider lips that glow from within
             - Ideal for a hydrating, long-lasting matte lipstick for a soft, cashmere finish

name: SERY Matte Care Lipstick Enriched With Shea Butter With SPF 15 - Empathy
des:
Lipsticks are every girl’s best friend. If you are in a quest to get that perfect pout and turn heads too, with the added richness of shea butter, jojoba oil and vitamin E, your reach ends at SERY Matte Care Lipstick. A creamy matte formula, that keeps the pout forever perfect, smudge-proof and long-lasting. And are you also dreaming about that perfect lip color? Longwearing SERY Matte Care Lipstick comes in 12 stunning shades with all hues of colors from nudes to pink shades, brown to maroon shades, and not to forget classic red shades.
           
           
             These luscious lipsticks deserve a permanent place in your vanity and give pout-worthy lips in just one stroke. It effortlessly glides on the lips and has one stroke application with high color pigment. The unique formulation of the lipstick ensures your lips stay comfortable, matte and smooth all day long.
             
             Features:
             
             
             Highly pigmented bullet lipstick that sets to a creamy matte finish
             Enriched with the goodness of shea butter, vitamin E and jojoba oil
             Lightweight and smooth formula glides easily ensuring comfortable wear
             Has SPF 15 that protects lips from sun damage
             Long lasting and smudge proof formula
             Free from parabens and mineral oil
             100% vegan and cruelty-free
             
             About the Brand: SERY, a brand for the millennials embarked on this journey in 2019. The purpose of SERY is to create a line of products that capture the essence of women of today. Whether it's getting glam at home, feeling confident at work, or making heads turn with your date night look, SERY is here to bring out the best in you! Indulge in a range of mesmerizing makeup products, crafted for use, on-the-go. Whether you like a smokey eye, a bold lip or soft pink cheeks, they are here to empower you to be a trendsetter!

name: Mamaearth Moisture Matte Longstay Lipstick With Avocado Oil & Vitamin E - Carnation Nude
des:
Finding the right lipstick is like finding a BFF. Meet your match - Mamaearth Moisture Matte Longstay Lipsticks are enriched with the natural goodness of avocado oil and vitamin E. With a lightweight formula, the lipstick nourishes your lips and seals in the moisture for up to 8 hours.
           
             Take your pick from 9 vibrant and high-intensity matte shades that stay on your lips for up to 12 hours, without smudging. That's not all, they're made safe certified, which means no toxins and no nasties, just dollops of color and care. Go and say yes to the right one (or two)!
             
             
             Features:
             
             12-hour long stay smudge-proof formula: Gives your lips a gorgeous long-lasting tint that doesn't smudge or fade.
             Moisturizes and nourishes lips: Formulated with avocado oil and vitamin E to give your lips a burst of hydration and keep them soft and supple.
             100% natural and made safe certified: It's Made Safe Certified and is formulated with the best of naturally nourishing ingredients for utmost care and the perfect tint.
             
             About the Brand: Mamaearth is Asia's first MadeSafe certified brand. The brand aspires to take care of every parents' and baby's well being from head to toe with safe, toxin-free and international standard products. All Mamaearth products go through multiple testing processes, including clinical dermatology testing in Europe, to ensure that they are of supreme quality and suit global standards. Each product that Mamaearth brings to you is certified to be free of harmful chemicals and dermatologically tested for sensitive skin. The products are a unique combination of science as well as Ayurveda to provide solutions to your everyday problems. Every product that the brand brings to you is made from 100% organic and natural ingredients.
             
             
             
             Explore the entire range of Lipstick available on Nykaa. Shop more Mamaearth products here.You can browse through the complete world of Mamaearth Lipstick .
             Alternatively, you can also find many more products from the Mamaearth Moisture Matte Longstay Lipstick With Avocado Oil & Vitamin E range.

name: Nykaa Ultra Matte Mini Lipstick - Nefertiti 02
des: We at Nykaa get inspired by the love we receive for our work. Your love and appreciation inspired us to come up with these mini versions of your favorite Ultra Matte lipsticks. Now 12 of your most loved shades have been added to the Mini family! These super matte lipsticks adorn your lips with a veil of full-bodied colour and a one-stroke matte finish. Its super smooth Jojoba Oil and Vitamin E enriched formula glides on your lips effortlessly and keeps them nourished all day long. Keep your favourite Nykaa Ultra Matte Mini handy while on the go, to give your lips an insta pick-me-up.
